The traffic that is going in a virtual machine from the VDS

q:
One of the datastore is marked inaccessible. In /var/log/vobd.log file and the following errors are displayed:

VMHBA failed to login to iqn.XXX because of a network connection failure Login to iSCSI target iqn.XXX failed. The iSCSI initiator could not establish a network connection to the target. What is the cause of this issue?

a.option: Port binding with VMkernel ports which are on same subnets
Port binding with VMkernel ports which are on different subnets

Create a new management network port group for vmk0

Two instances of vCenter Server in MSCS cluster, both instance is active at a time

q:
In VMware, if the following error is displayed:

Error: 'An unexpected error was received from the ESX host while powering on VM. 
Reason: (Cannot allocate memory).

and, the following is displayed on the ESxi vmkernel.log :

CPU:WARNING: Heap vmfs: Maximum allowed growth (XX) too small for size (XXXX). 
Heap vmfs already at its maximum size. Cannot expand

Which of the following statements is correct?

The CPU of the VM is very large
The memory in the VMs is very large whereas the ESXi host has run out of memory to allocate

Only an administrator of the Subscribed library can add, modify, and remove contents from the Subscribed library.
Only an administrator of the published library can add, modify, and remove contents from the published library.

q: Which of the following statements is false?

a.option: VMW_PSP_MRU - The host selects the path that it used most recently.
VMW_PSP_FIXED - If the host uses a default preferred path and the path's status turns to Dead, a new path is selected as preferred.

VMW_PSP_RR - The host uses an automatic path selection algorithm rotating through all active paths when connecting to active-passive arrays, or through all available paths when connecting to active-active arrays.
